(Requires attunement by a creature. The properties of this item are affixed to a piece of jewelry.)

This item is a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.nniVtdJB1oyk5Sa3]{locus} and can be combined with other Loci per the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.nniVtdJB1oyk5Sa3.JournalEntryPage.zI0VWGKnYZqz6sKd]{Combining Loci} rules.

While attuned, the relic merges magically merges with a piece of jewelry (ring, brooch, amulet, necklace, etc.) of your choice. This can be done during a short or long rest, and requires 10 minutes to complete. Upon completion, red blood forged crystals appear on the item affixed to. Once completed, the jewelry becomes magical.

Effect: Your attack rolls have their critical strike range expanded by 1. At the DM's discretion, when you critically strike a target you can choose to have your current and maximum hit points increase by 1 until the user unattunes from the locus.

Your death saving throws are reduced by 1 + 1 for every {proficiency bonus} maximum hit points gained.
